title: 05/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the latest drama in Aaron Rodgers’ campaign to leave the Packers and why this is starting to remind him of the Royal Family. He has an interesting thought on how the 49ers can get the most out of QB Jimmy Garoppolo before transitioning to 1st round pick Trey Lance. He also explains the chain reaction that rippled throughout the NFC after Tom Brady signed with the Buccaneers. Plus, Nick Wright from FS1 joins the show to give his thoughts on the potential Packers-Rodgers break up and his surprise NBA MVP.   

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
